EmailTemplate.name: OHSU Mail Term Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Your team member $!identityName's $!applicationName Application's Account Email is going to be terminated


Please find below the details for the user.

  • Username : $!identityName
  • Application Name : $!applicationName


If you have any queries, please reach out at IAMsuppport@ohsu.com


Best Regards
Your's OHSU Helpdesk
